video.title: The Following
video.synopsis: A former FBI agent returns to duty when an infamous serial killer escapes death row. He soon discovers that the killer has a dangerous following.

episodes.synopsis: Serial killer Joe Carroll escapes from prison, prompting former FBI agent Ryan Hardy to come out of retirement.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ryan, Agent Weston and FBI Specialist Debra Parker investigate the history of Carroll's psyche.
episodes.title: Chapter Two

episodes.synopsis: When a new follower, Rick Kester, emerges, the FBI try to predict his next move. An interview with Jordy leads Parker to Kester's wife.
episodes.title: The Poet's Fire

episodes.synopsis: Maggie cooks up a plan to put an end to Hardy. Jacob confesses a secret to Emma, as Paul becomes wary of their relationship.
episodes.title: Mad Love

episodes.synopsis: Carroll uses his lawyer to communicate a message. Hardy gets a tip that leads him to Emma, Jacob and Paul's location.
episodes.title: The Siege

episodes.synopsis: Hardy creates tension among Emma, Jacob and Paul, leading Emma to make a move. The agents discover that the Following may be bigger than they thought.
episodes.title: The Fall

episodes.synopsis: Joe Carroll makes plans to be transferred to a different facility, leading to nervous moments for the FBI, which is wary of the arrangement.
episodes.title: Let Me Go

episodes.synopsis: Nick Donovan takes the lead in the search for Joey Matthews, upsetting both Ryan and Parker. The followers make Agent Weston their next target.
episodes.title: Welcome Home

episodes.synopsis: With Donovan now in charge, Ryan and Parker must find ways to work around him. Carroll contacts Ryan to ask for help in locating Claire.
episodes.title: Love Hurts

episodes.synopsis: When Carroll learns where Claire is being held, Ryan races against time to move her before a group of followers get to her first.
episodes.title: Guilt

episodes.synopsis: Hardy and Parker discover a place with a dark and twisted secret. Emma's betrayal of Jacob continues to disrupt life at the followers' manor.
episodes.title: Whips and Regret

episodes.synopsis: Weston returns to duty after recovering from his injuries, and he teams up with Hardy to pursue a follower who could lead them to Carroll and Claire.
episodes.title: The Curse

episodes.synopsis: At odds with Carroll, Roderick kidnaps Joey as collateral against both the followers and the FBI. An encounter between Claire and Carroll goes sour.
episodes.title: Havenport

episodes.synopsis: As the FBI closes in on the compound, a desperate Carroll hatches a plan for a distraction that will give him an opportunity to escape.
episodes.title: The End Is Near

episodes.synopsis: The FBI and the followers stage a final showdown that spills over to a lighthouse, and Hardy and Weston attempt to locate Parker, who's in danger.
episodes.title: The Final Chapter

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a new murder spree, the FBI calls on Ryan and agent Mike Weston to speak with the lone survivor in order to help them solve the case.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: After the tragic subway killings, Ryan's obsession with the case becomes stronger than ever. Meanwhile, revelations about Joe's new life surface.
episodes.title: For Joe

episodes.synopsis: The FBI discovers Ryan is investigating Emma and what remains of the Havenport cult; meanwhile, a shocking event forces Joe into a new action plan.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: Despite Mike's warnings about their private investigation, Ryan and Max keep digging, while Joe and Mandy meet a new follower in need of assistance.
episodes.title: Family Affair

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Max capture a suspect leading to deadly complications. Joe gets used to his new home and apologizes to Emma for abandoning her.
episodes.title: Reflection

episodes.synopsis: After discovering Lily's location, Ryan and Max look to the FBI for backup; meanwhile, Joe adjusts to a new working "arrangement" with Lily.
episodes.title: Fly Away

episodes.synopsis: A threat to Max's life distracts Ryan and the FBI from the hunt. Joe, Emma and Mandy seek refuge at a cult compound but receive a strange welcome.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Joe forms a new plan while Emma and Mandy adapt to life at the cult. Ryan seeks answers by tracking down the man who originally taught Joe to kill.
episodes.title: The Messenger

episodes.synopsis: Ryan, Max and Weston discover information that leads them closer to uncovering the mole within the FBI -- which results in complications of its own.
episodes.title: Unmasked

episodes.synopsis: Joe sets a deadly plan in motion using new acolytes to carry out his demands. Meanwhile, Ryan and Max devise a plan to contact Joe.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet

episodes.synopsis: While Ryan and Mike gain insight into the real instigator of a bloody massacre, Joe continues to train the Korban cult.
episodes.title: Freedom

episodes.synopsis: After a series of public condemnations of Joe and his followers, Joe targets the son of a man who stands against him.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Ryan tracks down the location of the Korban compound with hopes to infiltrate the cult and capture Joe Carroll, but all doesn't go exactly as planned.
episodes.title: The Reaping

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Mike try to stop Joe's murderous plan from launching, while Claire makes a decision that leads her into dangerous territory.
episodes.title: Silence

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Luke hold Claire's life in the balance, avenging Lily's death and forcing enemies Ryan and Joe together to save the woman they both love.
episodes.title: Forgive

episodes.synopsis: As Joe Carroll awaits execution, the FBI discovers a new murder scene that includes a threatening personal message aimed at Ryan Hardy.
episodes.title: New Blood

episodes.synopsis: Mark makes a threat to the FBI after his followers abduct agent Jeffrey Clarke; Ryan attempts to learn more about Andrew's connection to Mark.
episodes.title: Boxed In

episodes.synopsis: Ryan addresses inflammatory allegations made by Clarke; Ryan, Max and Weston seek the latest killer; Kyle and Daisy have doubts about Mark.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: After Mark's followers carry out an attack on a fire station, they inadvertently tip off the FBI to Mark's location and jeopardize their future plans.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: The disappearance of a key witness threatens the Strauss trial; Max and Weston pursue Mark and Strauss while Ryan prepares to visit Joe Carroll.
episodes.title: A Hostile Witness

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Mike's latest search takes them to a small town in New York beset by a series of missing persons, leading to a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: With Carroll's execution approaching, Ryan attempts to extract information that could help identify and apprehend a new target; Max returns to duty.
episodes.title: The Hunt

episodes.synopsis: Mike and Ryan start closing in on the suspect in the latest killings, leading to further tragedies; Joe invites Ryan to his execution.
episodes.title: Flesh & Blood

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Theo return to Joe Carroll as they seek each other; Max and Mike trace a stolen laptop; Mark reconnects with Daisy; Gwen has big news.
episodes.title: Kill The Messenger

episodes.synopsis: Ryan must intervene when a hostage situation occurs at the prison on Joe's execution day, and Theo monitors the situation from afar.
episodes.title: Evermore

episodes.synopsis: Ryan works with another agent to discover more atrocities in Theo's past; Ryan's personal life is in turmoil as he deals with recent developments.
episodes.title: Demons

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Daisy propose a partnership with Theo, offering that they can blackmail the FBI; Tom is forced to put himself and Mike in danger.
episodes.title: The Edge

episodes.synopsis: Ryan and Theo negotiate deal terms; Ryan goes back to Gwen and finally hears her important news; Max and Mike face danger.
episodes.title: A Simple Trade

episodes.synopsis: Ryan closes in on Theo but must be careful not to fall into a trap; Eliza works with Theo to arrange a way for him to flee the country.
episodes.title: Dead or Alive

episodes.synopsis: In the series finale, Ryan scrambles to save Gwen from Theo as he realizes that he may be facing an even greater evil.
episodes.title: The Reckoning
